name: SimTunes
description:
SimTunes is a simulation game developed by Toshio Iwai Works. It came out on 03-01-1996. It was published by Maxis. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
You can play SimTunes on PC.
David Abrams and Michael Wyman produced the game. It was scored by Benimaru Itoh, Jerry Martin and UrumaDelvi.
